title: Science teacher competency enhancement project for higher education online transition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Education Tool Usage Experience, Elementary Science Curriculum Knowledge
context.additional_context: A teacher training course applying activity-based lesson design and asynchronous collaborative learning strategies for transitioning from traditional face-to-face to online learning environments

learning_goals: Develop three or more activity-based lesson plans for designing science classes in online environments
Complete two or more projects using digital tools (LMS, discussion forums, etc.) that support asynchronous collaborative learning
Collaborate with peer teachers to produce one improvement report based on case studies of online science education
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
